website_summaries.verdict: Sunscreen that’s as gentle as water on sensitive skin and won’t irritate or sting children’s eyes during application.
pros: Formula contains naturally sourced 100% zinc oxide for sun protection
Also features oat to soothe the skin
Sweat- and water-resistant for up to 80 minutes
cons: Some users find it difficult to spread
Like other natural sunscreens, it leaves a white cast on the skin

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: Typical chalky, very white sunscreen. I only use these kinds because the chemical ones burn my face. I mix this with a face moisturizer to help it spread more easily, as this is like trying to spread honey on your face. If you use more than a small bit, you'll not be able to blend in the whiteness. Definitely not for darker skinned people, unless you want to look very odd. I use a makeup sponge to blend it and I still look like a mild ghost. But it beats the chemical sunscreen. This will dry out your skin ifdomt wash it off at the end of the day. Also, hard to get off as it's water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna H

customer_reviews.title: Want to look like a ghost, use this.
customer_reviews.text: Did the job but turns skin white and lasts for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Bill

customer_reviews.title: Minimal scent, smooth application
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) creamy and applies easily 2) minimal scent 3) good sun protection even with high UV index outdoors Cons: 1) feels a bit sticky after the application
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Tampered? No seal upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: My son has sensitive skin and has broken out several times from other sunscreens that have avobenzone and octisilate in them. This is great. The only worrisome problem about this product is that there is no tampered resistant seal - especially because it’s a children’s product. When it arrived I thought someone messed with it and had to test it on myself to ensure nothing harmful happens to my child.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Bourget

customer_reviews.title: Great protection, subtle smell and rich consistency! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first to put SPF cream for my 8month old son. However, this SPF cream changed my mind - as it seems to have great protection. We were out under the California sun for hours at the beach and I had this cream on, topping up every hour or so - he did not burn - he did get a nice tan though! The cream has rich consistency - so you do need to rub it in well - it was challenging as he wiggles a lot. But, once it is on, it protects him very well. Smell wise, it is quite subtle and pleasant actually! I highly recommend this one!
customer_reviews.author: Khanu’s Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunscreen
customer_reviews.text: Great for my redhead with sensitive skin and easily burns! Provides great sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for the little ones!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the sunscreen! I like it because it’s a natural one and I don’t like putting on chemicals on my children. This does have a pretty thick consistency and will leave a white appearance to the skin but I don’t really mind it as long as they are being protected from the suns harmful rays! Summer is around the corner and we are protected lol
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Works great for sensitive and easily burning skin
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my little one who has really sensitive skin and burns easily. This hadn’t irritated his skin and it has helped him so much out in the sun. As long as I keep reapplying every so often and after being in the water he does not burn. It doesn’t smell great but most sunscreens dont.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: 4.5/5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: Solid sunscreen. I bought it for me rather than a child, but that’s because I wanted a more natural sunscreen with a higher spf for my fair skinned husband. It has a slight smell but it doesn’t smell like regular sunscreen. It might not be evident in the photos, but it does leave a white/purple cast on my tan skin so I think it would be safe to assume that the darker your skin is, the more the cast will show. It’s really difficult to rub into the skin, especially if you have a lot of hair (like my husband). Overall, I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Box

customer_reviews.title: Overall good
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen has a decent smell to it. It is very thick and must be rubbed in all the way. Even then, I feel like it leaves you looking a little white and ghostly.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Nyhus

customer_reviews.title: Great protection for fair skin
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this sunscreen. Used it for my 24-month old that really likes water and play on the direct sun all day ( I do try hard to keep her in shaded area, but toddler has it’s own mind and refuses to comply :) ) Yes, it goes on white, but it provides excellent protection, being fair skinned she hasn’t burned, and had no adverse skin reaction. Yet after all day, she needs a good scrub in a bath to remove this powerful protective layer. I would highly recommend this cream for small children with fair skin. It truly worked for my toddler!
customer_reviews.author: Khrystyna R.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and goes on well
customer_reviews.text: I mostly use this on my face (and use a spray for my body) and it definitely goes on a bit easier than other Zinc Oxide sunscreen options that are typically very thick. The bottle isn't huge so if you plan to use for the whole body it may not last, for example it probably wouldn't last long with kids in swimsuits for a week on the beach but it's a good size to keep on hand for occasional use.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Terrible protection
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this brand regularly for my children but this time it didn’t work at all. My kids wound up sunburnt and with extremely dry, chapped skin! I am highly disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Breana

customer_reviews.title: Spreads like frozen butter, yucky smell, a complete disaster
customer_reviews.text: We use other products by Aveeno but this one is just not working for us at all. As others have mentioned, it is extremely hard to spread. It feels thick and heavy, and the smell is unpleasant. We can't judge if it is really protecting from the sun - it was so hard to put on our toddler -- and it did only partially since he completely lost it -- that we changed plans and stayed away from the sun. Avoid if you can!
customer_reviews.author: Noah

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: I love it, it is so protecting for my daugthers skin, it lasts longer than others and it is wter resistant as well. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Came like it was already used?
customer_reviews.text: It had no seal over the lotion opening. It was super greasy and it appeared to have been used. I did get a refund for it, but I would not purchase this again. I would purchase in person maybe from a store where I could see if it was sealed and appeared to be new.
customer_reviews.author: SAG

customer_reviews.title: Goes on smooth
customer_reviews.text: I'll be buying this sunblock again. It provides good coverage without any overwhelming smell. I've been using it every day for my 4 year old with no issues and he has pretty sensitive skin. My favorite thing about this sunblock is that it blends in well. It goes on smooth and isn't super thick and sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Future Pigeon

customer_reviews.title: If you're African American... Stay away
customer_reviews.text: This product is not for black skin. It leaves a white film on the face. I bought it for myself because sunblock burns my eyes and this says no tears. I can't believe the white film it leaves on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: What mess!
customer_reviews.text: Applying this to my sons skins was difficult, It was a little thick. After a few minutes it turned my son's skin white In addition, It was difficult to was off when I gave him a bath. I had to literally rub his skin. WILL NOT buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used this in prolonged sunlight but for at least an hour it works great, no sunburns. It's worth the extra time to blend it in as it's not greasy. We've been using mineral sunscreens for a few years now with no problems.

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy with it and it meets my expectations

customer_reviews.author: Stef

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: Used on my my husband and my kids. Except for my three-year-old who already has our skin the rest of us all burned terribly from this very thick very difficult to spread paste I would never purchase again very small bottle for a very high price

customer_reviews.title: Great for fair/sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This sunscreen is great for my daughter. She’s a fair skinned redhead with sensitive skin. This keeps her protected from the sun but also keeps her skin moisturized. Only down side is it’s so thick and hard to put on without leaving a heavy white residue. But I’ll take it if it will keep her from being a lobster with a rash all over.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful

customer_reviews.author: Shontoya Currington

customer_reviews.title: Nice spf

customer_reviews.title: Good sunscreen, terrible, strong, long lasting  smell

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.title: Great for young children

product_meta.title: Aveeno Kids Continuous Protection Zinc Oxide Mineral Sunscreen Lotion for Children's Sensitive Skin with Broad Spectrum SPF 50, Tear-Free, Sweat- & Water-Resistant, Non-Greasy, 3 fl. oz
product_meta.description: An effective kids' mineral sunscreen that's as mild as water to skin, Aveeno Kids Continuous Protection Sensitive Skin Sunscreen Lotion with Broad Spectrum SPF 50 contains skin-soothing oat and naturally-sourced 100% zinc oxide active ingredient. The mineral sunscreen for kids provides superior broad spectrum protection from UVA/UVB rays and is both sweat- and water-resistant for 80 minutes. From the pediatrician-recommended brand, this hypoallergenic SPF 50 sunscreen lotion is designed for children's sensitive skin and applies easily to lock in moisture without stinging. Its tear-free formula is non-greasy and is free of parabens, phthalates and fragrance. Suitable for use on face and body, use this sunscreen with zinc oxide on your children every day during outdoor activities with the family.
feature_bullets: 3-fluid ounce travel-size tube of Aveeno Kids Continuous Protection Sensitive Skin Sunscreen Lotion with SPF 50 for superior broad spectrum protection from harmful UVA and UVB rays for your child's skin

This effective mineral sunscreen lotion is as mild as water to sensitive skin and applies to kids' skin easily to lock in moisture without stinging or irritation. It's suitable for use on both the face and body
Specially formulated for children's delicate skin, it contains naturally-sourced 100% zinc oxide active and skin-soothing oat, and is both sweat-resistant and water-resistant for up to 80 minutes
From the pediatrician-recommended brand, this sunscreen lotion features a tear-free formula that is non-greasy, hypoallergenic and paraben-free, phthalate-free and fragrance-free

Use this sunscreen with zinc oxide on your children every day during outdoor activities with the family to help prevent sunburn. Reapply after 80 minutes of swimming or sweating, immediately after towel drying and at least every 2 hours
